name: receiptjs
description: JavaScript printing libraries for receipt printers

scripts.build:browser: esbuild src/receipt.js --bundle --format=iife --global-name=Receipt --outfile=dist/receipt.js && esbuild src/receipt-printer.js --bundle --format=iife --global-name=ReceiptPrinter --outfile=dist/receipt-printer.js && esbuild src/receipt-serial.js --bundle --format=iife --global-name=ReceiptSerial --outfile=dist/receipt-serial.js && esbuild src/receipt-usb.js --bundle --format=iife --global-name=ReceiptUsb --outfile=dist/receipt-usb.js
